## TimerBuilderOptions.interval property

Tick interval in milliseconds (default: 1000).

**Signature:**

```typescript
interval?: number;
```

## Remarks

Controls how frequently the timer updates. Smaller intervals provide more granular countdown display at the cost of more updates.
